means: 估计，评价，评估( estimate的过去式和过去分词 )
（粗略）估计（…的距离、价值、数目、大小、重量、费用等），估量，预算

sentence.Network_en: It is estimated that every year 50 unaccompanied children arrive in Britain.
sentence.Network_cn: 据估计，每年有50名儿童独自来到英国。

sentence.Network_en: An estimated seven million people are at risk of starvation.
sentence.Network_cn: 估计有700万人面临着饿死的危险。

sentence.Network_en: We cannot measure pain directly. It can only be estimated.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们无法直接度量出疼痛的程度，而只能是作出估计。

entry.def: If you estimate a quantity or value, you make an approximate judgment or calculation of it.

example.ex: Try to estimate how many steps it will take to get to a close object...
example.tran: 尽力估算一下达到一个近距离目标需要多少步。

example.ex: I estimate that the total cost for treatment will be $12,500...
example.tran: 我估计治疗费用总共会有12,500美元。

entry.def: An estimate is an approximate calculation of a quantity or value.

example.ex: ...the official estimate of the election result...
This figure is five times the original estimate...
example.tran: 这个数据是最初估算的5倍。

entry.def: An estimate is a judgment about a person or situation which you make based on the available evidence.

example.ex: I hadn't been far wrong in my estimate of his grandson's capabilities.
example.tran: 我对他孙子的能力的判断还不算太离谱。

entry.def: An estimate from someone who you employ to do a job for you, such as a builder or a plumber, is a written statement of how much the job is likely to cost.

example.ex: The shop also offers a curtain-making and fitting service. Quotes and estimates can be prepared by computer on the spot.
example.tran: 那家商店还提供窗帘制作和安装服务，而且可以用计算机现场制作报价单和预算书。

auth_sentence.content: Several hundred Nigerians are estimated to be in Libya.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Several hundred Nigerians are estimated to be in Libya.

auth_sentence.content: Lebanon's entire population is estimated at four million.
auth_sentence.res_content: Lebanon's entire population is estimated at four million.

auth_sentence.content: They correlated estimated duration of addiction with these two measures.
auth_sentence.res_content: They correlated estimated duration of addiction with these two measures.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They correlated estimated duration of addiction with these two measures.

Sentence.sentence: With the world's population estimated to grow from six to nine billion by 2050, researchers.
It is estimated that 25% of all methane that released into the atmosphere coming from farm animals.
Yet due to poor practices in harvesting, storage and transportation, as well as market and consumer wastage, it is estimated that 30-50% of all food produced never reaches a human stomach.
Interest in this aspect of the settlement has focused on "orphan" works, where there is no known copyright holder – these make up an estimated 5-10% of the books Google has scanned
